meanings.definition: A Sicilian dish consisting of chopped eggplant, tomatoes, olives, and capers.
meanings.sent1: I tried making caponatas for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious caponatas with fresh ingredients.
meanings.sent3: When the caponatas danced in the pan, they smelled amazing!
meanings.sent4: Her caponatas of flavors created a symphony in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The colorful caponatas on the plate looked like a work of art.

meanings.sent1: The buffet had various dishes, including caponatas.
meanings.sent2: We brought home leftovers, and now our fridge is full of caponatas.
meanings.sent3: The caponatas at the party were the life of the celebration!
meanings.sent4: The caponatas in the garden seemed to multiply overnight.
meanings.sent5: The shelves were stocked with jars of caponatas for the winter.
